name: cursor-usage-summary
description: Display individual usage in status bar and detailed team vs pooled usage on click

cursorUsageSummary.apiToken.description: Your Cursor authentication token. Use one of these formats: (1) Full cookie: 'WorkosCursorSessionToken=user_01...::eyJ...' OR (2) Just the token value: 'user_01...::eyJ...'. To get this, open cursor.com in your browser, press F12, go to Application > Cookies > https://cursor.com, and copy the WorkosCursorSessionToken value.

cursorUsageSummary.proxy.description: Proxy URL to use for API requests (e.g., http://your-proxy:8080). If not set, will auto-detect from environment variables (https_proxy, http_proxy).

cursorUsageSummary.statusBarAlignment.description: Alignment of the status bar item.

cursorUsageSummary.statusBarPriority.description: Priority of the status bar item. Higher values move it to the left (for Right alignment) or right (for Left alignment).

cursorUsageSummary.compactMode.description: If enabled, shows a more compact status bar item (just icon and percentage).
